description: Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada in Brandon, MB has a requirement for the supply, delivery, offload and installation of 1 New Class 7 Self-Propelled Combine compatible with all existing implements and technology in use at Brandon Research & Development Centre.

full_summary:
===============

**Contract Title**
----------------

Title of the contract: Purchase of a New Class 7 Self-Propelled Combine
French Title: Achat d'une nouvelle moissonneuse-batteuse automotrice (classe 7)

**Contract Reference**
---------------------

Reference Number: WS4603274437-Doc4628836191
Amendment Number: 1
Solicitation Number: WS4603274437

**Publishing Details**
---------------------

Publication Date: June 17, 2024
Tender Closing Date: August 30, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
Amendment Date: July 10, 2024

**Notice**
--------

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal for the purchase of a new Class 7 Self-Propelled Combine.

**Contract Specifications**
---------------------------

The Contract is for the supply, delivery, offload and installation of 1 New Class 7 Self-Propelled Combine compatible with all existing implements and technology in use at the Brandon Research & Development Centre in Brandon, Manitoba.

**Key Objectives**
-----------------

The new combine will replace an existing machine that has reached the end of its life cycle. The new combine will allow for timelier harvesting compared to timelines offered by a custom combine contractor. It will also enable staff to set the thresher with greater accuracy and utilize modern data collection technology.

**Trade Opportunities**
----------------------

This contract is open to qualified bidders who have entered into a Trade Agreement with the Government of Canada.

**Contract Entity**
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is responsible for the procurement process.

**End User**
------------

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) will be the end user of the contract.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information, please contact Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC) at kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Link to Notice**
-----------------

The official notice for this contract can be found on the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20038843?extsite=MjAwMzg4NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. [400]
